column5: Just so everyone knows Sam has made an account on OFC he is going by Young Fisher.  He is a great kid and a avid fishermen... also happens to be my Girlfriend's oldest child.  hopefully he does not give me too hard of a time on here..  G
Let him know that if I catch him smoking I will throw him in the lake!
lol i promise never again
no smoking! haha
I didnt like it so i wont do it again lol
haha, yeah its stupid.. theres not point. just awful for you. good choice to stay away from it!
Thats very true.
Welcome aboard Sam. Nice meeting you at Lakair. Looking forward to hearing of your fishing stories.
I know that guy.Welcome aboard. Joe
You too Roy i had a great time cant wait for ice fishing
Thanks joe
Welcome Sam, it was a pleasure meeting you.  All I have to say is "You have no idea."  Joey
LOL you too
Hey Sam,Sam miss's ya Had a great time with you and your family at Lakair. Thank your mom for me for the great dinner she put together for us..  Chris
Welcome Sam.  Glad to have met you guys this year and hopefully you had a great time - good enough to come back next year.
Glad to see yaa on the board. I hope you learn alot of the in's and out's of fishing.   Art
welcom Sam hope you enjoy it here it was great meeting you at lakair. Don't let gerritt leave the boat sit there get out as much as you can and remember all the tricks for next year's GTG  latter Guy
Thank you Chris and everyone else from Lakair that made me feel like a true fisher and i cant wait to see you all next year   Sam
Hi Sam.
hi sam welcome aboard

Dan, by the looks of the pictures I have seen, if you threw everybody in the lake that was smoking the water level would be back to normal. Welcome to you Young Fisher! I am glad to hear that you had an opportunity at a young age to see the best that fishing has to offer:camaraderie, mentoring, fun, and good food! Enjoy this site and enjoy your fishing!! Jim PS Gerritt is a good man, perhaps the two of you can stop smoking together
Welcome Sam, it was nice to meet you, I'll look forward to your fishing reports....but please, don't be in a rush to go ice fishing  Maureen
hahaha thanks guys
